docs.horizon_years: Simulation length; longer horizon allows later phases to accrue area/power.
docs.phases.phase0_days: Initial setup (no launches); affects when production/launching starts.
docs.phases.phase1_days: Ramp-up phase; by default launches still gated until phase 2 in this model.
docs.phases.phase2_days: Steady expansion phase when daily PV can be launched.
docs.production.learning_curve_b: Learning-curve exponent; lower b accelerates throughput growth over time.
docs.launch_strategy.cadence_per_day: Global cap on packages launched per day across rails.
docs.launch_strategy.target_a_AU_range: Single deployment band; sets mean radius for OD and 1/r^2 power.
docs.launch_strategy.target_bands_AU: Multiple deployment bands; area split by optional band_weights; per-band OD and power tracked.
docs.launch_strategy.band_weights: Optional weights for area split across bands; normalized to 1.
docs.caps.max_growth_multiplier: Upper bound on replication growth multiplier (limits exponential growth).
docs.resources.usable_mass_mercury_kg: Estimated mass of usable materials from Mercury composition model.
docs.transport.fleet_power_MW: Tug fleet electrical power; caps daily deployed area.
docs.transport.area_per_MW_per_day: Scaling from fleet power to deployed area per day (model constant).
docs.beaming.tx_conversion: Transmitter conversion efficiency factor in delivered power.
docs.beaming.pointing: Pointing/phase efficiency factor in delivered power.
docs.beaming.rx_conversion: Receiver conversion efficiency factor in delivered power.
docs.beaming.earth_atmosphere: Atmospheric transmission factor for delivered power to Earth.
docs.collectors.efficiency_1AU: Base PV efficiency at 1 AU for the default collector type.
docs.collectors.degradation_per_year: Annual PV degradation; reduces efficiency exponentially over years.
docs.mercury_site.radiator_area_m2: Thermal derating proxy; larger radiators reduce efficiency losses.
docs.vehicles.launchers.mercury_mass_driver.c: Cooldown between shots; sets base launch cadence.
docs.vehicles.launchers.mercury_mass_driver.m: Mean time between failures; with MTTR sets availability for cadence.
Mean time to repair; with MTBF sets availability for cadence.
docs.targets.total_collector_area_m2: Target cumulative area; summary reports time to reach if within horizon.
docs.targets.optical_depth_max: Reference OD threshold; reported OD is capped to this for readability.
